topic.title: Week 1 - Introduce Yourself
topic.text:
Week 1 - Introduce Yourself

The Discussion Board will be part of your course grade. Each week you find a new forum, which will be titled by the Week Number and the Due date. This week, so that you become familiar with the discussion board, I've asked each of you to introduce yourself to your classmates. My introduction is available for you to read. Please feel free, and it would be a nice touch, if you responded to one, two or more of your classmates. Follow the link to the discussion board, click on Week 1 - Introductions and click on the Add New Thread button to add your introduction. Remember that you are graded on your introduction. You should answer the following questions within your introduction:

  • Your name
  • Your location - city only, please don't give your address
  • Why are you taking this course?
  • What degree or certificate are you working on?
  • Why Edmonds Community College?
  • Your experience within the information technology field.
